sentences.en: A sale is being held to raise funds for the school.
sentences.cn: 正在举行拍卖为该校筹集资金。

sentences.en: An appeal fund was launched at the instigation of the President.
sentences.cn: 总统授意发起了一项救援基金。

sentences.en: Fund managers are poorly placed to monitor firms.
sentences.cn: 基金管理人不适合监管公司。

sentences.en: He is possessed of an extraordinary fund of energy.
He's accused of misusing $17.5 million from a secret government slush fund.
sentences.cn: 他被指控滥用秘密的政府行贿基金，金额达1,750万美元。

sentences.en: Its $25m reserve fund had been run down to around $8m.
sentences.cn: 其2,500万美元的储备金已被减少到了800万美元左右。

sentences.en: Several research institutions were closed down for lack of fund.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏资金,好几家研究所被迫关门了.

sentences.en: Thank you for contributing generously to the scholarship fund.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你为奖学金基金慷慨捐款.

sentences.en: The fund was in danger of losing its tax-exempt status.
sentences.cn: 该基金面临不再享受免税待遇的风险。

sentences.en: The fund was set up to try to save the cathedral.
sentences.cn: 设立基金以挽救大教堂。

sentences.en: The fund will make payments of just over £1 billion next year.
sentences.cn: 该基金明年的支付额刚好过10亿英镑。

sentences.en: The project is jointly funded by several local companies.
sentences.cn: 这个项目由几家当地公司联合出资。

sentences.en: The scientist abandoned his research for lack of fund.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏资金,这位科学家放弃了他的研究工作.

sentences.en: They are raising a fund in support of this good cause.
sentences.cn: 他们正在为赞助这一有益的事业而集资.

sentences.en: They decided to set up a fund for this purpose.
sentences.cn: 他们决定为此专立一项基金.

sentences.en: This fund may not be drawn on without permission.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱非经批准不得动用.

sentences.en: We made a contribution to the famine relief fund.
sentences.cn: 我们给饥荒赈济基金捐了款.

words.tran_cn: 提供资金；用发行长期债券的方法来收回短期债券
资金筹集人；资金筹集活动

phrases.tran_cn: 基金经理，财务经理；基金管理人
开放型基金，追加型基金
公积金；福利基金；准备基金

trans.tran_en: an amount of money that is collected and kept for a particular purpose
to provide money for an activity, organization, event etc
to provide money for an activity, organization, event etc
